ticket_id='CHR-AA3BDB9E' program_id='CSUTLDTC' section='data_flow' issue_type=<IssueType.INCOMPLETE: 'INCOMPLETE'> description='The transformation for FEEDBACK-CODE to WS-MESSAGE is described, but the specific extraction of severity and message number (SEVERITY, MSG-NO) and their mapping to WS-SEVERITY and WS-MSG-NO is not clearly detailed.' guidance='Add a transformation step that explicitly shows how SEVERITY and MSG-NO from FEEDBACK-CODE are moved to WS-SEVERITY and WS-MSG-NO fields.' priority=<IssuePriority.MEDIUM: 'MEDIUM'> created_at=datetime.datetime(2026, 1, 18, 17, 41, 12, 948144) resolved=False resolution_notes=None
